body: Yep, we've got four GPU machines now. Right now `test_distributed.py` is being run in that configuration. https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-linux-xenial-cuda8-cudnn6-py3-multigpu-test/
